review:
Last 1.5 months were really overwhelming for my entire family. I tested positiveÂ with Covid 19 in April and after that, my mother and father were testedÂ positiveÂ with Covid 19.

When I tested positiveÂ initially, we were really clueless on which doctorÂ to consult. After talking to multipleÂ people, we decidedÂ to reach our Dr. Ankit Nijhara. When I interacted with him for theÂ first time, he listened to me very calmly and understood my condition. AfterÂ that, he suggested and explained to me the treatmentÂ and related procedure very thoroughly.

With his guidance, I recovered swiftly and didnâ€™t face any post Covid complications.

After that,Â my mother and father testedÂ positive and I reached out toÂ Dr. Ankit Nijhara again. Considering the age of my parents (60+ years), he spent a decentÂ amount of time understanding their medical history and existingÂ medications.Â 

AfterÂ analysing their past and current medical condition, he suggested the treatment which helped them to recover swiftly without any complications. We feel really fortunate to get our Covid 19 treatment fromÂ Dr. Ankit Nijhara. Even in such unprecedented times, he responded to each and every query very carefully and well on time.

I really appreciate his dedication, medical knowledge and way of treating patients. Kudos to Dr. Ankit.Â
